function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for increased privacy and safety concerns in telemedicine","Impact":"Compromised patient privacy and safety, leading to distrust and reluctance to share medical information","Mitigation":"Implement novel methods and technologies to improve patient privacy and security","Technologies":"New technologies such as 5G and blockchain","People":"Patients","Owner":"Healthcare providers and technology developers"},{"Description":"Reliance on telemedicine as a substitute for all in-person clinic visits","Impact":"Potential for misdiagnosis or missed critical medical issues","Mitigation":"Proper use and regulation of telemedicine to ensure it complements in-person visits rather than replacing them entirely","Technologies":"Regulatory and monitoring technologies for telemedicine","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Increased demand for healthcare services in aging communities","Impact":"Strain on healthcare systems and potential for inadequate care for aging populations","Mitigation":"Development of enhanced healthcare services and smart solutions to address increasing demand","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, healthcare innovation","People":"Aging communities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"}]}
